p: Chloroquine is a widely used antimalarial and autoimmune disease drug. Recently, chloroquine has been reported as a potential broad-spectrum antiviral drug [77, 78]. Wang et al. found that chloroquine effectively suppresses the recently emerged novel CoV (SARS-CoV-2) in vitro [79]. Chloroquine is a cheap and safe drug that has been used for more than 70 years and thus it is potentially clinically applicable against COVID-19.
